summary: PHP Ethna Action/View/Template File Switch Plugin.
name: ethna-switch
description:
PHP Ethna Action/View/Template File Switch Plugin.

Ethna PHP Web Application Framework
http://ethna.jp/
http://translate.google.co.jp/translate?js=n&prev=_t&hl=ja&ie=UTF-8&layout=2&eotf=1&sl=ja&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fethna.jp%2F&act=url

command
:ETA[ction]     open action file.
:ETV[iew]       open view file.
:ETT[emplate]   open template file.

completion
<C-X><C-A>      insert action file dir.
<C-X><C-V>      insert view file dir.
<C-X><C-T>      insert template file dir.
install_details: copy ethna-switch.vim into your plugin directory.
